title: Front Brake Pads - Inspection

body.body: Front Brake Pad InspectionD54; D64; D71; DB4; DBB; DC3; DC4; DCZ; DD2; DD4; DE2; DEX; DF4; DG4; DP3; DP4; DPZ; DS1; DSA; DSB; DSX; DVY
Check the brake pads anti-rattle springs and retaining pins. Renew any component which shows signs of damage or corrosion.
Check there is no sign of leakage from the piston seals. Rectify any problems before installing the brake pads.
Inspect the brake pads for wear (see
